contentrichtext.text: '''Paul Hill''' is the name of: *[[Paul Jennings Hill]] (1954–2003), American anti-abortion activist and murderer, executed *[[Paul Hill (Guildford Four)]] (born 1954), one of the Guildford Four *[[Paul Hill (flight director)]] (born 1962), American flight director for NASA Mission Control Center *[[Paul Hill (musician)]] (1934–1999), American music director, founder of the Master Chorale of Washington (formerly the Paul Hill Chorale) {{Hndis|Hill, Paul}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hill, Paul}}
